positions.subtitle: Communiqué IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: Conducted 6 open houses and numerous knowledge sessions impacting 2000+ students of IIT Kharagpur.Conducted 3 day-long workshop in association with Microsoft Technology Associate having a footfall    of 1000+ students.Spearheaded the drafting of career assistance literary endeavours: "Playing it Soft" and "The Guessing Game" attracting a viewership of 10000+ students.Designed several posters for the official Facebook page of Communiqué and mentored a group of freshmen in designing.
positions.title: Secretary
positions.description_html:
Conducted 6 open houses and numerous knowledge sessions impacting 2000+ students of IIT Kharagpur.

Conducted 3 day-long workshop in association with Microsoft Technology Associate having a footfall of 1000+ students.

Spearheaded the drafting of career assistance literary endeavours: "Playing it Soft" and "The Guessing Game" attracting a viewership of 10000+ students.

Designed several posters for the official Facebook page of Communiqué and mentored a group of freshmen in designing.
